title: BitcoinMoses
author: BitcoinMoses
content: If Satoshi Nakamoto Sign a message and transfer some Bitcoin from Genesis Block ?Who will believe in him ? Craig Wright ?Â  Or Dorian Nakamoto ? I Dorian Nakamoto will believe in Him first. Because, he has enjoyed free lunch and a good amounts free Bitcoins. For Craig Wright, it will be a night mare, he might think thatb BitcoinJesus is playing the Joke. How about you as Bitcoin Talk Forum member ? Will you believe it is the real Satoshi Nakamoto ? Let's bet about it. I bet 22 Bitcoin from Genesis Block which came from transaction fees and some from some people. As I said, if Satoshi move 50 BTC from Genesis Address then there will another 22 Bitcoin there, so I must bet this 22 Bitcoin. Those who will believe in him, he will distribute the 22 Bitcoin to them under riddle for them to win the whole 22 BTC. Please make your comments wisely. No body believe that I am Satoshi Nakamoto. Even though, I am saying I am Satoshi Nakamoto. " Blessed are those who has not seen me but believe in me" - Jesus. "Don't believe, but verify"- Nakamoto Satoshi

comments.author: Cantsay
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on March 18, 2023, 05:15:52 PMimage source

comments.author: seoincorporation
comments.body: This is an epic scenario and in this point, satoshi should sign from multiple addresses and not only one. Because any user running a brute force program could find a satoshi's private key with the right luck. So, I don't think a message and a transaction from satoshis address would be enough to claim his identity nowadays.And if someone finds a private key from satoshi he could make much more money selling that key to Faketoshi than by claiming the 50btc on that address. It make since for all right?

Craig Wright ?Â  Or Dorian Nakamoto ? I Dorian Nakamoto will believe in Him first. Because, he has enjoyed free lunch and a good amounts free Bitcoins. For Craig Wright, it will be a night mare, he might think thatb BitcoinJesus is playing the Joke. How about you as Bitcoin Talk Forum member ? Will you believe it is the real Satoshi Nakamoto ? Let's bet about it. I bet 22 Bitcoin from Genesis Block which came from transaction fees and some from some people. As I said, if Satoshi move 50 BTC from Genesis Address then there will another 22 Bitcoin there, so I must bet this 22 Bitcoin. Those who will believe in him, he will distribute the 22 Bitcoin to them under riddle for them to win the whole 22 BTC. Please make your comments wisely. No body believe that I am Satoshi Nakamoto. Even though, I am saying I am Satoshi Nakamoto. " Blessed are those who has not seen me but believe in me" - Jesus. "Don't believe, but verify"- Nakamoto SatoshiGuess too much money made the poor "real Satoshi" crazy, he doesn't know what to do with so many bitcoins. Quoted post is my evidence.ðŸ¤£ Â Let us keep the blocked genesis coins from discussion, I accept a simple signed message, but why would Satoshi do that? Why would he break loose chaos onto his life by coming out as the inventor?

comments.author: sheenshane
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinMoses on March 27, 2023, 11:00:32 PMIf Satoshi Nakamoto Sign a message and transfer some Bitcoin from Genesis Block ?If Satoshi signs a message with the private key from the Genesis block and moves some Bitcoin from the same address, it could be strong evidence of his identity.Â  But I highly doubt he will never do that, he is not dumb to ruin his real life once he reveals himself and it could be he becomes subject to lawsuits, government regulations, or even criminal charges.I would like to stop thinking that Satoshi will reveal himself in the future or there's a chance to reveal himself in public and brings solid evidence just to convince people.Â  Just respect his decision to remain anonymous, besides, without him, Bitcoin continued to succeed and be widely adopted in different countries.

comments.author: dothebeats
comments.body: At this point, what's the benefit for him? He already made a lot of money off of bitcoin theoretically so revealing that he's still in control of those coins would just make the world and governments look for him. If anything, he wouldn't get something from the genesis block and instead get some coins from some inconspicuous address that he has that still has some money on it. The attention he will get from doing such a move will be something that will never be beneficial to him, that's for sure.

comments.author: logfiles
comments.body: Quote from: Cantsay on March 27, 2023, 11:03:38 PMQuote from: Cantsay on March 18, 2023, 05:15:52 PMimage sourceIt's unfortunate that some people fell for his antics or perhaps no idea what kind of person OP is. It's also bad that one can not directly see negative feedback when someone posts in bitcoin discussion, but I will just leave this here for those can see.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=trust;u=955818Yep, that's BitcoinMoses' trust summary.

comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.body: YOU ARE A BULLY. YOU SHOULD GO AND CREATE YOUR OWN SHITCOIN TALK FORUM AND BULLY PEOPLE WHO EVER YOU WANT TO BULLY. SO I WILL PRAY TO THE LORD GOD OF MONEY TO SORT OUT WITH YOU. comments.author: BitcoinMoses
comments.body: Sheenshane, I remember your Forum ID. You are quite intelegent and reasonably civilised person. I wish you a good luck with your Forum ID. It has story connected to bitcoin invention. Which you also know it for sure. Bless you. Quote from: sheenshane on March 27, 2023, 11:29:28 PMQuote from: BitcoinMoses on March 27, 2023, 11:00:32 PMIf Satoshi Nakamoto Sign a message and transfer some Bitcoin from Genesis Block ?If Satoshi signs a message with the private key from the Genesis block and moves some Bitcoin from the same address, it could be strong evidence of his identity.Â  But I highly doubt he will never do that, he is not dumb to ruin his real life once he reveals himself and it could be he becomes subject to lawsuits, government regulations, or even criminal charges.I would like to stop thinking that Satoshi will reveal himself in the future or there's a chance to reveal himself in public and brings solid evidence just to convince people.Â  Just respect his decision to remain anonymous, besides, without him, Bitcoin continued to succeed and be widely adopted in different countries.

comments.author: franky1
comments.body: the real satoshi knows the genesis coins cant movemoses lack of knowledge of this debunks himself (yet again) @moses how about take more time to learn bitcoin instead of pretending you are the inventor. it has never helped you to pretend to be the inventor because it keeps revealing how little you know about bitcoineach time you pretend. it reveals how little you know about bitcoin. so stop that game. stop wasting months with games. and instead inspire yourself to use the time to actually learn about bitcoineven if satoshi came back he has no back door or access or power over bitcoin and from his writings he did not want power(one of the reasons he left) so his presence wont mean anything.after all not many people are excited about coblee real name announcement about making litecoin or buterin real life name announcement when making ethereum.. so its just a famous for 15 minute segment then people move on to discuss other topicsits like christmas.... months of anticipation and dreams and hopes for what will be unwrapped. and then 15minutes of unwrapping and its all over

As you think, you know for sure that the numbers from Genesis Bitcoin Block Address can't be moved. Now can educate the people and explain it details why the numbers can't move from first Bitcoin Address ? Â You are the only one who has plenty of time to encourage and teach about bitcoin to many Newbies. Who told you that the numbers from first Bitcoin address cannot be spent ? Â Can Theymose move the numbers from his Signatory Bitcoin address ? How about second Bitcoin address ? Â Which is btc address no. 1, where the is Block mining reward 50 Bitcoin. I told, many times, if you want teach me something regarding bitcoin or blockchain or something else what I do not know, I have no problem to learn from you.

comments.author: Cryptomiles1
comments.body: Sometimes there are some people we don't need to attend to or even replying their post because they always reason the unimaginable how couldÂ  Satoshi come online with a separate account without his real profile if at all he wants to come online and why would he want to sign a message with the Genesis Block just to prove is the real? Where are the mod and admin, this topic should be quickly locked without any delay.
